title: Yosemite National Park: Visitation Statistics
body: Visitation Statistics       This table shows average visitation to Yosemite National Park. Although the park is open all year, nearly 75% of visitors come during the busiest six months (May through October). These numbers are averages from 2001 through 2015. If you're looking for more in-depth statistics for Yosemite or other national parks, you can get them from the National Park Service visitor use statistics website.     Month  % of visitors # of visitors   January 3% 110,018   February 3% 110,694   March 4% 149,151   April 6% 226,592   May 10% 357,201   June 13% 488,716   July 16% 598,387   August 16% 612,005   September 13% 470,338   October 9% 327,474   November 4% 159,812   December 3% 120,339
